A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I'm a huge Star Wars fan but I found this pretty disappointing. I don't want to post spoilers so I'll just say that visuals and sound were very good as always. The scripts and the characters were also very good. However the story itself was a huge let down. My main gripes are the wasted potential of some villains who are meant to be extremely powerful in the star wars universe.
The blatant merchandising\, with some form of cuddly toy looking animal available for all ages of genders.
The ridiculous 'chase' of rebel ships. Why the Imperials didn't just light speed ahead of them I don't know.
But the main gripe; the cheap gags. Luke throwing a lightsabre\, Fin falling out of bed\, Rey breaking some cart. Cheap attempts at slapstick humour that brought down the entire feel of the film.
